name: The Garden Wars
description:
After an "incident", the sleepy town of Rotsburg will never be the same. Join the newly created club of teenagers, called the 'Garden Busters'( you know like Ghost Busters but now Garden Busters...fighting weeds and other things instead of ghosts...?...?...Ok, getting back to the story).  

Danny created a special weapon with his dad's old flashguns that gets rid of those pesky garden monsters, but watch out those little critters can spit poison to paralyze you for hours. 

I wish you good luck fellow Garden Buster, may you succeed in cleaning the gardens of Rotsburg with haste and no pain.

HOW TO PLAY?

Movement = Point & Click (turn based)

Camera Move = WASD

Camera Turn = Q (Left Turn) & E(Right Turn)

Leave scene - Escape

CREDITS:

Thank you to every artist who helped and contributed to the game.

TO THE PLAYER...

Thank you for playing my game. Hope you enjoy it!

Lots of green love...

Rona Hattingh
